com.zendesk.sdk.network

Interface UploadService


  • public interface UploadService
    Defines the operations that can be carried out on Uploads.

    For more information on the APIs available see: Attachment REST API Documentation

    Currently this is defined using retrofit annotations but this could be changed in the future as long as these signatures remain.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAttachment(String authorization, String token, retrofit.Callback<retrofit.client.Response> callback) 
      void uploadAttachment(String authorization, String filename, retrofit.mime.TypedFile typedFile, retrofit.Callback<UploadResponseWrapper> callback) 

    • Method Detail

      • uploadAttachment

        @POST(value="/api/mobile/uploads.json")
void uploadAttachment(@Header(value="Authorization")
                         String authorization,
                         @Query(value="filename")
                         String filename,
                         @Body
                         retrofit.mime.TypedFile typedFile,
                         retrofit.Callback<UploadResponseWrapper> callback)

      • deleteAttachment

        @DELETE(value="/api/mobile/uploads/{token}.json")
void deleteAttachment(@Header(value="Authorization")
                           String authorization,
                           @Path(value="token")
                           String token,
                           retrofit.Callback<retrofit.client.Response> callback)
